title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 113.17 - Filing of orders, appeal papers and applications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 113.17 - Filing of orders, appeal papers and applications

State Regulations

Wherever orders, appeal papers, applications or other
papers may or are required to be filed by any provision of this Part, they
shall be filed with the secretary of the city board. Unless otherwise permitted
by this Part or, upon written application, by the appeal board, the parties
shall serve and file all memoranda relating to the issues raised by an appeal
paper or application with that appeal paper or application. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
113.17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
